name: Dumb Rabbits
description:
Description :

Dear friend, in this game you have to build your village. In it you will need your big heart, kind soul and good spirits. I hope you will show kindness to the little creatures who want to live. 

What can go wrong? . . .

Controls:

1 - Mouse control only.
2 - When you hold down the left mouse button on the rabbit, you can drag it. 
3 - When connecting two rabbits you create a house blank.
4 - The height of the house can be adjusted by dragging the mouse, after that, when the workpiece turns green, you can release the left mouse button and it will start building.

Have a good game!
